video_name: 复杂情况_佟丽娅_2_英文_正常节奏_男声_6.mp4
prompt: FPS-16. The video plays at normal speed. A woman with elegant features and dark hair styled in a loose high bun stands indoors, speaking with expressive openness as she turns her head gracefully through a sequence of positions. She wears a sleek black spaghetti strap top and delicate sparkling earrings that catch the light. Her lips move with fluid animation as she speaks, conveying warmth and presence without haste. Her head begins turned slightly to the side, then slowly rotates forward to face the camera directly, holding that position for a moment before gently turning back toward the side again, completing the motion with calm intention. Her shoulders remain relaxed and her posture upright, while one hand drifts softly along her collarbone in a gentle arc, enhancing the rhythm of her speech. The background is composed of soft white drapes that diffuse natural daylight, creating a serene and refined atmosphere. The lighting highlights the smooth contours of her face and the subtle texture of her skin, lending an air of quiet sophistication. The camera holds steady at eye level, capturing her upper torso and the graceful flow of her movements, emphasizing the harmony between her voice, gestures, and shifting gaze. The scene feels poised and intentional, focused on elegance and expressive communication.
negative_prompt:
FPS-16. The video plays in distorted slow motion with unstable speed and jittering frames, suffering from severe stuttering and abrupt scene cuts. A deformed, disfigured figure with no elegant features—face warped, skin texture broken, deep unnatural wrinkles etched across forehead and cheeks, teeth misaligned and crooked, lips frozen in a rigid, unchanging shape regardless of speech. Dark hair appears mangled and clumped, styled into a chaotic, melting bun. Wears a glitched black spaghetti strap top with jagged edges and inconsistent shading; earrings are pixelated, flickering, or missing entirely. Skin glows unnaturally under harsh, uneven lighting—overexposed highlights clash with crushed shadows, creating high-contrast banding and color bleeding.

The background is a collage of grainy textures, striped patterns, and corrupted visual noise, lacking depth or coherence. The figure’s movements are erratic: head jerks violently between angles instead of turning smoothly, shoulders twitch without coordination, left hand contorts into a claw-like distortion near the collarbone, fingers twisted and fragmented as if rendered by broken geometry, right arm spasms unnaturally. No graceful flow—only stuttering, broken gestures that snap abruptly between poses.

Camera work is disjointed: framing shifts unpredictably, zooms lurch in and out, focus drifts wildly, capturing blurry, low-resolution close-ups interspersed with sudden wide shots. Motion is choppy, laggy, and unnatural—every gesture feels forced, glitched, or artificially interpolated. The overall aesthetic is low-quality 3D animation with extreme sharpness artifacts, heavy grain, visible compression noise, and intrusive watermark logos or text elements overlaid randomly. No poise, no charisma—only visual decay, mechanical failure, and digital corruption.

video_name: 复杂情况_赵本山_1_中文_稍慢节奏_男声_1.mp4
prompt: FPS-16. The video plays at normal speed. An older man with short gray hair and a warm expression stands indoors, speaking with animated energy as he gestures gently with his hands. He wears a dark jacket over a light collared shirt, with a small floral pin on his lapel. His mouth opens wide in expressive speech, lips moving fluidly as he delivers his words with calm conviction. The background features soft beige curtains and a red upholstered chair, suggesting a formal yet comfortable indoor setting such as a conference room or reception hall. Natural ambient lighting creates a relaxed and dignified atmosphere. The man begins by facing forward, then smoothly turns his head to the side as if addressing someone nearby, before returning his gaze to the front with a composed motion. His right hand rises slightly near his cheek, palm open and fingers relaxed, accompanying his speech with subtle, graceful movement. His posture remains upright but not rigid, conveying presence and ease. The scene captures a moment of engaged communication, with steady camera framing focused on his upper body and natural gestures, highlighting his expressive delivery and thoughtful demeanor.
negative_prompt: FPS-16. The video plays in distorted slow motion with unstable speed and jittering frames, exhibiting severe stuttering and frame skips. An older man with short gray hair appears grotesquely deformed — his face warped with unnaturally deep, cracked wrinkles, misaligned teeth protruding unevenly from a frozen,僵硬的 mouth that never moves or changes shape during speech. His hands are twisted, broken, and trembling violently, fingers contorted into impossible angles as they jerk erratically near his cheek, lacking any graceful motion. His posture is slumped and unnatural, conveying discomfort rather than presence. He wears a dark jacket over a light shirt, but the fabric appears pixelated and melting, with the floral pin on his lapel rendered as a glitched, unrecognizable smear. The background dissolves into a chaotic collage of grainy textures and jagged striped patterns, devoid of curtains or chairs, creating visual noise instead of a formal setting. Lighting is harsh, inconsistent, and overly saturated — casting unnatural shadows and blown-out highlights that flatten depth and distort form. The camera stutters violently between abrupt cuts and jarring zooms, losing focus mid-motion, framing the subject off-center with disjointed composition. Every gesture is delayed, glitchy, and out of sync with implied speech. The entire scene feels like a low-resolution, corrupted 3D animation with extreme contrast, excessive sharpness, visible compression artifacts, embedded logos, and floating text overlays — completely unrealistic, cartoonish, and visually degraded.
